name: Havooz ICT Services
tagline: The biggest Big-Data Solution provider in Turkey
description:
Havooz ICT Services Ltd. provides large-scale data processing and storage solutions in an economical way for various sectors. We provide technical support during the setup and management of private and public clouds based on open-source distributed frameworks including Hadoop and Hive.
In addition to the performance gains and cost-savings, Havooz has effective solutions for fast development of sector-specific applications and reduced time-to-market of Value Added Services. The same solution infrastructure can be used for both structured and unstructured data analysis, where the former is mostly used by telecommunication, finance, retail, and logistics sectors and the latter in social media, e-government, healthcare and production applications.
